items.text: kept a bit low angled in again and Perera keeps it out. If he had missed, he would have been a dead duck
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: shuffles across this time and works it away towards square leg to get off strike
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to MDKJ Perera, 1 run

items.text: full on offstump and Mathews checks his intended drive. 11 balls without scoring now for him
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: defended into the offside again. The required run-rate is creeping up a bit now, with the surfeit of dot balls
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.preText: Noor tareen: "i think Mathews need to play a inning like Mushy played today" - he does. And Mushifqur also started slow after the early wickets, so Sri Lanka aren't out of it yet.
items.text: flat and on the stumps, patted back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: that's close And given! Goes a bit wider of the stumps, draws him forward to defend but beats the bat and strikes pad. That looked close and the finger went up quickly. No reviews left for Sri Lanka either
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDKJ Perera, OUT

dismissal.text: MDKJ Perera lbw b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 11 (24b 2x4 0x6) SR: 45.83

items.preText: Pratik: "Mortaza is today's Gavin Larsen.I know very few will be familiar with this name.but his economy in 130 matches was around 3.8 as far I can recall." - Gavin Larsen was an ODI legend for a brief while, and with good reason. The most compelling dibbly-dobbly bowler I've ever seen.
items.text: moves across and drives towards mid-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 1 run

items.text: Mathews is off the mark takes a step forward and pats it into the leg-side. Took him 13 balls to score his first run
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, 1 run

items.text: strays down the pads and he's able to tuck it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 1 run

items.text: flighted a bit on the stumps and flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, 1 run

items.preText: Dilip: "What i like and admire most about mortaza is his commitment and dedication.He knows about his lack of pace but compensate that with his stiff line and length and always bowl long spells.a big fan from india..." - He's been a canny operator for sure. And a decade back, he had the pace too. Age has naturally slowed him down, but not dulled his sharpness
items.text: full and on the stumps, defended back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: strays down leg and it's hit through midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, 2 runs

items.preText: "So, India is without Kohli, Chandimal is absent for Sri Lanka and now Bangladesh has lost Tamim. It is only fair if Pakistan loses one of their top batsmen. " - Ashish believes in justice for all
items.text: goes down on one knee and square drives it past a diving cover fielder for a couple of runs. Good looking shot and timed well too
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length, he transfers weight on the back foot and goes deep in his crease to work it away towards fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, 1 run

items.text: back of a length and defended back.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shanaka, no run

items.text: take a step forward and defends, a bit awkwardly but with the full face of the bat.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shanaka, no run

items.preText:
Shakib into the attack, round the wicket

Vamsi : "Gavin Larsen, Roger Towse, Nathan Astle, Chris Harris, I think I forgot a couple more, the glorious dibbly-dobbly bowlers of New Zealand. " It was such fun to watch them
items.text: stroked through the offside
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mathews, 1 run

items.text: full on offstump. Flat and not much spin, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, no run

items.text: slightly more air, and defended into the offside again
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, no run

items.text: fires it into the pads, but Shanaka, goes back to clip it to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, 1 run

items.text: elegantly square driven by Mathews, but only for a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mathews, 1 run

items.text: gets a big stride in and defends towards point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, no run

items.preText: Gyas: "@Saurabh Are you really 76 years old, born in 1942?" - I'm ageless. But the 42 is a reference to the answer to Life, the Universe and Everything.
items.text: comes forward and turns it away to the leg-side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, no run

items.text: takes two steps down the track and hits it past the bowler to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, 1 run

items.text: shuffles across defends it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, no run
